sentences.en: At this junction Maston could not repress his emotion.
sentences.cn: 到了这个阶段,梅斯顿再也克制不住自己的感情了.

sentences.en: Bertha frowned, finding it difficult to repress the sarcasms that rose to her lips.
sentences.cn: 伯莎皱起眉头, 她觉得要把溜到嘴边的挖苦话咽下去是件难事.

sentences.en: Brenda repressed the urge to shout at him.
sentences.cn: 布伦达克制住想对他吼的冲动。

sentences.en: By pushing aside unpleasant thoughts they merely repress these thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们对不愉快的想法不予理会，其结果仅仅是压制了这些想法。

sentences.en: Conclusion: The magnetic field can repress the metal corrosion.
sentences.cn: 结论磁场有抑制金属腐蚀的作用.

sentences.en: ConclusionEstrogen can repress osteoblasts apoptosis of rats induced by serum hungry.
sentences.cn: 结论雌激素能抑制血清饥饿诱导的大鼠成骨细胞凋亡.

sentences.en: He could hardly repress a smile at her simplicity.
sentences.cn: 见她如此天真,他都忍不住想笑了.

sentences.en: He had long ago repressed the painful memories of his childhood.
sentences.cn: 他长久压抑着儿时的痛苦记忆。

sentences.en: I could not repress a shiver whenever I thought of him.
sentences.cn: 我一想到他就忍不住颤抖.

sentences.en: I couldn't repress a sigh of admiration.
sentences.cn: 我忍不住发出一声赞叹。

sentences.en: People who repress their emotions risk having nightmares.
sentences.cn: 压抑情感的人容易做噩梦。

sentences.en: Repress the formation of the melanin grain and change its construction.
sentences.cn: 抑制黑色素颗粒的形成并改变其结构.

sentences.en: Repress the sour activity of ammonia, quickly the melanin's absorption.
sentences.cn: 抑制酪氨酸酶的活性, 加快黑色素的吸收.

sentences.en: The police were widely criticized for their role in repressing the protest movement.
sentences.cn: 警方因为他们在镇压抗议活动时所扮演的角色而广受批评。

sentences.en: Their voracity is legendary and even the most hardened warriors cannot repress a shiver if one speaks about them.
sentences.cn: 他们的贪食是传奇性的,甚至强壮的战士也会因为提起他们而无法抑制的颤抖.
它们按捺不住心中的热情.

sentences.en: Wu Sun - fu was unable to repress a sudden burst of laughter.
sentences.cn: 吴荪 甫 忍不住独自个哈哈笑了.

words.tran_cn: 重压；补加压力；[机] 再压
抑制，[心理] 压抑；镇压
抑制；镇压；约束（repress的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to control a group of people by force

trans.tran_cn: 克制， 抑制； 镇压， 压制
trans.tran_en: to stop yourself from doing something you want to do
